dict.string: Changelog: 2.4b1 - [Feature] Synchronization of files - [Feature] Growl notification support (see http://growl.info) - [Feature] Support for Novell Netware file listings (FTP) - [Feature] Limit number of concurrent connections to a remote host - [Feature] Apply permissions recursively (FTP) - [Feature] Norwegian Localization - [Feature] Transfer Queue with "Aqua" progress indicator - [Feature] Updated toolbar icons - [Feature] Added BBedit Lite to the list of supported editors - [Feature] Added TextMate to the list of supported editors - [Feature] Move remote files with copy and paste - [Feature] Put remote files into the transfer queue with copy and paste - [Feature] Provide a proxy icon for the connection in the window title bar - [Feature] The proxy icon in the window title barcan then be dragged to the bookmark drawer or the Finder. - [Feature] Select a file in the browser by typing its first character - [Feature] Limit the number of concurrent connections to server - [Feature] Apply default permissions to transferred files - [Feature] Tooltip in browser shows absolute path - [Feature] Tooltip in queue shows detailed info - [Feature] Dialog for duplicated files lists all at once - [Bugfix] Bookmark drawer icon has no text-only equivalent - [Bugfix] Tabbing between browser and filter box - [Bugfix] Quick Connect Field has initial focus - [Feature] Filter field is now a standard search field - [Feature] Display the number of files in the browser - [Feature] Bookmarks of recently connected hosts are saved in ~/Library/Application Support/Cyberduck/History - [Bugfix] HTTP download broken - [Feature] Read bookmarks from "/Library/Application Support/Cyberduck/" instead of the individual user bookmarks file if available - [Feature] Check for running transfers on application quit - [Feature] Updated FTP core (FTP)
